CustomField.description: Optional completion capability to invoke after agent execution completes. Used for egress actions like sending email replies, posting notifications, or triggering follow-up workflows. The capability is invoked after the final LLM response but before persisting execution results.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select an agent capability to invoke after this agent completes execution. Commonly used for email reply actions or notifications. Leave blank for fire-and-forget agents. Note: Only applies to non-conversational agents.
CustomField.label: Completion Capability
